/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a human element to the scene. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are mostly muted, creating a calm and serene atmosphere.
